title: Formula
text: Keep in mind that the formula to calculate the variance of a binomial distribution is Variance $$=$$ npq, where $$n$$ $$=$$ The Total # of Trials, $$p$$ $$=$$ Probability of Success, and q $$=$$ Probability of Failure. To then calculate our standard deviation, we can take the square root of our variance.
